DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess effect high protein ( HP ) normal protein diet ( NP ) patient polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) body mass index ( BMI ) -matched control sample southern Brazilian woman . Patients randomize receive high protein ( 30 % protein , 40 % carbohydrate , 30 % lipid ) normal protein ( 15 % protein , 55 % carbohydrate , 30 % lipid ) eight week . The investigator hypothesis different diet composition may influence change main characteristic PCOS , like hyperandrogenism metabolic syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: High Versus Normal Protein Diet Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS )
